vsParam: Let's take the bento and pies made by [px] to go on a picnic?
Wow~ The air is so fresh!

We often come here for adventure, but it feels good
to relax here occasionally ♪

Speaking of which... [px]. I frequently ask for
your help, so maybe it's not my place to say this...

You'll take any commission, won't you?
I mean, you never reject any commission...

You're such a nice person, which is not common.
[px], you're so great!

Wow, wonderful, [px]!
Totori praised you... Uh, that was a compliment, right?

Oh, [px]! These look so good,
could you please make bento for us too!

That pie looks delicious ♪
Can I try a piece?

Wow!
We're surrounded by so many people...

Wow, that's such heavy workload...
Are you sure you'll take it?
Haha, anyway, this is why [px] is so nice!
Hehe, good point. Ah, let me help you make bento!
